mapper.select: SELECT order_id, user_id, tb_spot_order_time.spot_id, tb_spot_order_time.start_time, tb_spot_order_time.end_time, order_date, order_status, note, tb_spot.spot_name, tb_spot_order_time.spot_order_time_id FROM tb_order, tb_spot, tb_spot_order_time WHERE tb_spot.spot_id = tb_spot_order_time.spot_id and tb_order.order_time = tb_spot_order_time.spot_order_time_id ORDER BY order_date DESC, start_time DESC, end_time DESC

SELECT order_id, user_id, tb_spot_order_time.spot_id, tb_spot_order_time.start_time, tb_spot_order_time.end_time, order_date, order_status, note, tb_spot.spot_name, tb_spot_order_time.spot_order_time_id FROM tb_order, tb_spot, tb_spot_order_time WHERE user_id = #{userId} and tb_spot.spot_id = tb_spot_order_time.spot_id and tb_order.order_time = tb_spot_order_time.spot_order_time_id ORDER BY order_date DESC, start_time DESC, end_time DESC

SELECT order_id, user_id, tb_spot_order_time.spot_id, tb_spot_order_time.start_time, tb_spot_order_time.end_time, order_date, order_status, note, tb_spot.spot_name, tb_spot_order_time.spot_order_time_id FROM tb_order, tb_spot, tb_spot_order_time WHERE tb_spot.spot_id = #{spotId} and tb_order.order_time = tb_spot_order_time.spot_order_time_id and tb_spot.spot_id = tb_spot_order_time.spot_id ORDER BY order_date DESC, start_time DESC, end_time DESC

SELECT tb_spot_order_time.spot_id, tb_spot.spot_name, tb_spot_order_time.spot_order_time_id, tb_spot_order_time.start_time, tb_spot_order_time.end_time, tb_spot_order_time.suggested_people, COUNT(CASE WHEN tb_order.order_status = 1 and tb_order.order_date = #{orderDate} THEN tb_order.order_status END) AS ordered_people FROM tb_spot, tb_spot_order_time LEFT JOIN tb_order on tb_spot_order_time.spot_order_time_id = tb_order.order_time WHERE tb_spot.spot_id = #{spotId} and tb_spot.spot_id = tb_spot_order_time.spot_id GROUP BY spot_order_time_id ORDER BY start_time ASC;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_order(user_id, order_date, order_time, note) VALUES (#{userId}, #{orderDate}, #{spotOrderTimeId}, #{note})
mapper.select: SELECT tb_spot_order_time.suggested_people > COUNT(CASE WHEN tb_order.order_status = 1 and tb_order.order_date = "2020-06-25" THEN tb_order.order_status END) AS ordered_people FROM tb_spot_order_time LEFT JOIN tb_order on tb_spot_order_time.spot_order_time_id = tb_order.order_time WHERE tb_order.order_id = #{orderId} GROUP BY spot_order_time_id
